components.value: Ground Preparation:

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "280g solid, dry biscuits violently dismembered."

components.value: 280g solid, dry biscuits violently dismembered.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "20g cocoa powder, dark as our souls."

components.value: 20g cocoa powder, dark as our souls.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "120g slowly and painfully molten butter."

components.value: 120g slowly and painfully molten butter.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Force everything in a cake tin with a diameter of 26 cm and use a cup to press your victim tightly against it, leaving a border of maybe 1 cm that is also pressed against the sides."

components.value: Force everything in a cake tin with a diameter of 26 cm and use a cup to press your victim tightly against it, leaving a border of maybe 1 cm that is also pressed against the sides.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Put it in the fridge for 10 Minutes and take it out right before it freezes to death."

components.value: Put it in the fridge for 10 Minutes and take it out right before it freezes to death.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Put it into the oven and torture your victim for 15 Minutes by 180°C."

components.value: Put it into the oven and torture your victim for 15 Minutes by 180°C.
Now Begin preparing Marshmello-Cheese Creme:

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Put 120g Marshmallows in a bowl, add 160g Cream Cheese and put it without mixing into the microwave for 1 Minute by 600 Watts."

components.value: Put 120g Marshmallows in a bowl, add 160g Cream Cheese and put it without mixing into the microwave for 1 Minute by 600 Watts.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Beat the mixture up with your whisk until it doesn`t look like it originally did anymore (A creme)."

components.value: Beat the mixture up with your whisk until it doesn`t look like it originally did anymore (A creme).
Add 120g Milk and continue mixing.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Add a teaspoon of lemon juice and continue mixing for a couple of seconds."

components.value: Add a teaspoon of lemon juice and continue mixing for a couple of seconds.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Now pour the liquified remains into the previously made cake ground so it fills the hole in its heart."

components.value: Now pour the liquified remains into the previously made cake ground so it fills the hole in its heart.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Put everything in the fridge for another hour."

components.value: Put everything in the fridge for another hour.
Eat it.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Clean your mess up so you can make another one."

components.value: Clean your mess up so you can make another one.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Let`s make a delicious Cocoa-Biscuit Cake with Marshmallow-Cheese Creme."

components.value: Let`s make a delicious Cocoa-Biscuit Cake with Marshmallow-Cheese Creme.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Let`s make a delicious Cocoa-Biscuit Cake with Marshmallow-Cheese Creme."
literal_string "You`re done. Alice is proud of you."

components.value: You`re done. Alice is proud of you.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You`re done. Alice is proud of you."
literal_string "Change Biscuit content according to Instructions. "

components.value: Change Biscuit content according to Instructions.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Change Biscuit content according to Instructions. "
literal_string "Change Cocoa content according to Instructions. "

components.value: Change Cocoa content according to Instructions.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Change Cocoa content according to Instructions. "
literal_string "Change Butter content according to Instructions. "

components.value: Change Butter content according to Instructions.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Change Butter content according to Instructions. "
literal_string "Change Marshmello content according to Instructions. "

components.value: Change Marshmello content according to Instructions.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Change Marshmello content according to Instructions. "
literal_string "Change Cheese content according to Instructions. "

components.value: Change Cheese content according to Instructions.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Change Cheese content according to Instructions. "
literal_string "Congratulations! You have made youself a perfect Alice Peter signature Cake."

components.value: Congratulations! You have made youself a perfect Alice Peter signature Cake.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Congratulations! You have made youself a perfect Alice Peter signature Cake."
